title: Who Is Ghislaine Maxwell? Jeffrey Epstein’s Accomplice Found Guilty of Sex Trafficking
sub_head: The British socialite was found guilty on five of six criminal counts in her trial
body:
Ghislaine Maxwell is a British socialite who was found guilty on five of six criminal counts in her sex-trafficking case, capping federal prosecutors’ push to bring the longtime confidante of disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein to justice.
“Maxwell enticed minor girls, got them to trust her, and then delivered them into the trap that she and Jeffrey Epstein had set,” then-Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss said in a July 2020 indictment. “She pretended to be a woman they could trust.”
